The image used in the claim was found on: a database free for public use, under the file name "Masada BW A.JPG".
The description of the image on Wikimedi: model of the northern palace" and that it is a retouched picture composed of two images.
The image was credited to Berthold Werne: who published multiple images of new and old sites in Israel on his own Wikimedia page.
Masada: the location depicted in the image, is a recognized heritage site in Israel, known for its ancient fortress constructed by Herod in the Judean Desert.
